name: e-commerce
description: This project is about to developed a E-commerce web api with node js ## Content - [Requirements](#Requirements) - [References](#References) ## Requirements - Ubuntu 18.04 LTS - node v15.12.0 - npm v7.6.3 ## References - [How to install node in Ubuntu](https://github.com/nodesource/distributions/blob/master/README.md#installation-instructions) - [What is an API](https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/what-is-an-api-and-how-to-test-it/) - [CRUD operations](https://www.codecademy.com/articles/what-is-crud)
